rayTrace(GameEntity, boolean, Vec2f, Vec2f, float, TraceResult) - Method in class vine.game.scene.SceneTracer
 
rayTrace(GameEntity, float, float, float, float, float, TraceResult) - Method in class vine.game.scene.SceneTracer
Trace for GameEntities in the scene that are intersected by a line segment that is defined by the given ray defined by the origin(originX,originY) and the direction(directionX, directionY) and extends the given distance (length of the distance form the origin to the other point of the line).
